name: Sunburnt
description: Sunburnt is a multiplayer zombie survival game where guns WON’T help you! Zombie outbreaks have struck the country, and only a few humans have survived. Conventional weapons have little effect on the dead but they have a weakness… Light which gives them intensely painful sunburns!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 700 MB available space
